title: Reconnect Bug
body: I won a game, and when I clicked next when it showed VICTORY, the game crashed. And when i login again, it showed reconnect, I pressed the button, its just open a dark window. What should i do

replies.body: Getting the same issue. I haven't found anything that works successfully.

Sounds like a ghost game. This can happen when there's a hiccup between the game server and your client and the message telling your client the game's over never gets received.  Should last for a maximum of 2 hours, but if you happen to see it for longer please let me know!
I had this same issue last night.  I have not tried to login back in since than.
You too? What is causing this?!
